QuestData.Title: Cleaning House
QuestData.Description: Not long ago, a new recruit showed up by the name o' Jacob Anders. He's been trouble since he got here, always drinkin' and pickin' fights, but he crossed the line this time.$B$BOne o' our patrols spotted him tradin' intel with the Horde - he's a traitor, commander! I thought ye would want tae deal with him personally.$B$BHe was out drinkin' by the water last time I saw him, and I'd bet me pappy's beard he's still there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deal with Jacob Anders at Southport.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have ye dealt with Mr. Anders yet, commander?
QuestData.RewardText: I think ye did the right thing, commander.
